item.description:
Hi All!

So sorry it took a few days to update the next meeting site and times. A new member has offered a new place for us to meet! Jeff Baker has a nice studio in Worcester and it looks like that's where we will head for our meeting. directions http://visionsbybaker...

I'd love it if you all could bring at least one new photo to show at this meeting. Let's look at and talk about what we are doing and any projects we are working on.

We also need to talk about our holiday party and print swamp for Dec! It's an annual tradition that folks seem to love. So let's make it good!

Can't wait to see you all again!

cheers,
Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography November Meetup
